SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bd.mapper.BdMainMapper.getBdList 입찰 공고 리스트 조회*/ SELECT BID_PBLANC_ID /* 입찰 공고 아이디 */ ,METAL_CODE /* 금속 코드 */ ,(SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'METAL_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.METAL_CODE) AS METAL_CODE_NM /* 금속 구분 */ ,(SELECT CODE_DCONE FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'METAL_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.METAL_CODE) AS METAL_CODE_NMA /* 금속 코드 */ ,BRAND_GROUP_CODE /* 브랜드 그룹 코드 */ ,ISNULL((SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'BRAND_GROUP_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.BRAND_GROUP_CODE),'ANY BRAND') AS BRAND_GROUP_CODE_NM /* 브랜드 그룹 코드명 */ ,BRAND_CODE /* 브랜드 코드 */ ,(SELECT BRAND_NM FROM IT_BRAND_INFO_BAS IB WHERE IB.BRAND_CODE = BB.BRAND_CODE ) AS BRAND_NM /* 브랜드 명 */ ,(SELECT NATION_CODE FROM IT_BRAND_INFO_BAS IB WHERE IB.BRAND_CODE = BB.BRAND_CODE ) AS NATION_CODE /* 국가코드 */ ,(SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM IT_BRAND_INFO_BAS IB INNER JOIN CO_CMMN_CD CC ON IB.NATION_CODE= CC.SUB_CODE WHERE IB.BRAND_CODE = BB.BRAND_CODE ) AS NATION_URL /* 국가 이미지 */ ,FRST_REGIST_DT ,ITM_SN /* 아이템 순번 */ , (SELECT GOODS_NM FROM IT_ITM_INFO_BAS WHERE 1=1 AND BB.ITM_SN = ITM_SN AND DELETE_AT = 'N') AS DSPY_GOODS_NM /*아이템상품명*/ ,(SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE) AS DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE /* 권역 대분류 코드 */ ,BDDPR_BEGIN_DT /* 투찰 시작 일시 */ ,BDDPR_END_DT /* 투찰 종료 일시 */ ,BID_STTUS_CODE /* 입찰 상태 코드 */ ,(SELECT CODE_DCONE FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'BID_STTUS_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.BID_STTUS_CODE) AS BID_STTUS_CODE_NM /* 입찰 상태명 */ ,PARTCPTN_ENTRPS_QY /* 참여 업체 수량 */ ,INTRST_ENTRPS_QY /* 관심 업체 수량 */ ,DSPY_AT /* 전시 여부 */ ,PBLANC_CANCL_AT /* 공고 취소 여부 */ ,OPENG_DT /* 개찰 일시 */ ,DELETE_AT /* 삭제 여부 */ ,BID_WT /* 수량 */ FROM dbo.BD_BID_BAS BB /* 입찰기본 */ WHERE 1=1 AND DSPY_AT = 'Y' /* 전시 여부 */ AND PBLANC_CANCL_AT = 'N' /* 공고 취소 여부 */ AND DELETE_AT ='N' /* 삭제 여부 */
AND BID_STTUS_CODE = #{bidSttusCode} /* 입찰 상태 코드 */
AND BID_STTUS_CODE between 20 and 40 /* 입찰 상태 코드 */
AND BRAND_GROUP_CODE = #{brand} /* 브랜드 00전체 01서구산 02비서구산 */
AND DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE = #{area} /* 권역 00전체 01인천 02부산 */
AND BDDPR_BEGIN_DT between ${searchDateFrom}000000 and ${searchDateTo}235959 /* 공고(마감) 날짜 */
AND BDDPR_END_DT between ${searchDateFrom}000000 and ${searchDateTo}235959 /* 공고(마감) 날짜 */
ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_DT DESC

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bd.mapper.BdMainMapper.getBdListTotalCnt 입찰 상태별 COUNT */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCnt /* 입찰 전체 목록 */ ,COUNT(CASE WHEN BID_STTUS_CODE=12 THEN 1 END) AS ExpectCnt /* 입찰상태:입찰예정 */ ,COUNT(CASE WHEN BID_STTUS_CODE=13 THEN 1 END) AS BidingCnt /* 입찰상태:투찰중 */ ,COUNT(CASE WHEN BID_STTUS_CODE BETWEEN 20 AND 40 THEN 1 END) AS EndCnt /* 입찰상태:마감 */ FROM dbo.BD_BID_BAS /* 입찰 기본 */ WHERE 1=1 AND DSPY_AT = 'Y' /* 전시 여부 */ AND PBLANC_CANCL_AT = 'N' /* 공고 취소 여부 */ AND DELETE_AT ='N' /* 삭제 여부 */
AND BRAND_GROUP_CODE = #{brand} /* 브랜드 00전체 01서구산 02비서구산 */
AND DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE = #{area} /* 권역 00전체 01인천 02부산 */
AND BDDPR_BEGIN_DT between ${searchDateFrom}000000 and ${searchDateTo}235959 /* 공고(마감) 날짜 */
AND BDDPR_END_DT between ${searchDateFrom}000000 and ${searchDateTo}235959 /* 공고(마감) 날짜 */

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bd.mapper.BdMainMapper.bdMypageList 마이페이지 목록 조회 */ SELECT BBD.BID_ENTRPS_NO /*입찰업체 번호*/ ,BBD.BID_PBLANC_ID /*입찰공고 아이디*/ ,BBD.BDDPR_DT /*투찰일시*/ ,BBD.DELY_CND_STDR_PC /*인도조건 기준가격*/ ,BBD.CNVRS_PREMIUM_AMOUNT /*전환 프리미엄 금액*/ ,BBD.BDDPR_PREMIUM_PC /*투찰 프리미엄 가격*/ ,BB.METAL_CODE /* 금속 코드 */ ,(SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'METAL_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.METAL_CODE) AS METAL_CODE_NM /* 금속 구분 */ ,(SELECT CODE_DCONE FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'METAL_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.METAL_CODE) AS METAL_CODE_NMA /* 금속 코드 */ ,BB.BRAND_GROUP_CODE /* 브랜드 그룹 코드 */ ,ISNULL((SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'BRAND_GROUP_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.BRAND_GROUP_CODE),'ANY BRAND') AS BRAND_GROUP_CODE_NM /* 브랜드 그룹 코드명 */ ,BB.BRAND_CODE /* 브랜드 코드 */ ,(SELECT BRAND_NM FROM IT_BRAND_INFO_BAS IB WHERE IB.BRAND_CODE = BB.BRAND_CODE ) AS BRAND_NM /* 브랜드 명 */ ,(SELECT NATION_CODE FROM IT_BRAND_INFO_BAS IB WHERE IB.BRAND_CODE = BB.BRAND_CODE ) AS NATION_CODE /* 국가코드 */ ,(SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM IT_BRAND_INFO_BAS IB INNER JOIN CO_CMMN_CD CC ON IB.NATION_CODE= CC.SUB_CODE WHERE IB.BRAND_CODE = BB.BRAND_CODE ) AS NATION_URL /* 국가 이미지 */ ,BB.FRST_REGIST_DT /* 최초등록일시 */ ,BB.ITM_SN /* 아이템 순번 */ , (SELECT GOODS_NM FROM IT_ITM_INFO_BAS WHERE 1=1 AND BB.ITM_SN = ITM_SN AND DELETE_AT = 'N') AS DSPY_GOODS_NM /* 아이템상품명*/ ,(SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE) AS DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE /* 권역 대분류 코드 */ ,BB.BDDPR_BEGIN_DT /* 투찰 시작 일시 */ ,BB.BDDPR_END_DT /* 투찰 종료 일시 */ ,BB.BID_STTUS_CODE /* 입찰 상태 코드 */ ,(SELECT CODE_DCONE FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'BID_STTUS_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.BID_STTUS_CODE) AS BID_STTUS_CODE_NM /* 입찰 상태명 */ ,PARTCPTN_ENTRPS_QY /* 참여 업체 수량 */ ,INTRST_ENTRPS_QY /* 관심 업체 수량 */ ,DSPY_AT /* 전시 여부 */ ,PBLANC_CANCL_AT /* 공고 취소 여부 */ ,BB.OPENG_DT /* 개찰 일시 */ ,BB.DELETE_AT /* 삭제 여부 */ ,BB.BID_WT FROM dbo.BD_BID_BAS BB INNER JOIN BD_BDDPR_DTL BBD ON BB.BID_PBLANC_ID= BBD.BID_PBLANC_ID WHERE BBD.BID_ENTRPS_NO = #{bidEntrpsNo} AND BB.BID_STTUS_CODE = #{bidSttusCode} -- 13: 투찰중, 31: 낙찰, 32: 유찰
AND BBD.SCSBID_AT = #{scsbidAt} -- Y: 낙찰, N: 패찰
ORDER BY BID_PBLANC_ID

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bd.mapper.BdMainMapper.bdMypageList 마이페이지 목록 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN BB.BID_STTUS_CODE=13 THEN 1 END) AS BIDDING_CNT /* 입찰 전체 목록 */ ,COUNT(CASE WHEN BB.BID_STTUS_CODE=31 AND BBD.SCSBID_AT='Y' THEN 1 END) AS ApprovedCnt /* 입찰상태:입찰예정 */ ,COUNT(CASE WHEN BB.BID_STTUS_CODE=31 AND BBD.SCSBID_AT='N' THEN 1 END) AS RejectedCnt /* 입찰상태:투찰중 */ ,COUNT(CASE WHEN BB.BID_STTUS_CODE=32 THEN 1 END) AS AuctionCnt /* 입찰상태:마감 */ FROM dbo.BD_BID_BAS BB INNER JOIN BD_BDDPR_DTL BBD ON BB.BID_PBLANC_ID= BBD.BID_PBLANC_ID WHERE BBD.BID_ENTRPS_NO = #{bidEntrpsNo}

/* com.m2m.fo.bd.mapper.BdDetailMapper.selectbdDelyCndList */ SELECT SUB_CODE, CODE_DCONE, CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE 1=1 AND MAIN_CODE = 'BRAND_GROUP_CODE' AND SUB_CODE != '@' AND DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY SUB_CODE
